runs.comm: fullish, outside off stump, driven well but straight to cover
short in length outside off, 129. kmph, forced off the back foot but can't beat backward point
full pitched around off stump, Akmal drives sweetly - all the three shots have been well struck- but again straight to mid-off
full in length but sliding down the pads, flicked to long leg region
on a length, around the middle stump line, Akmal leans forward to defend
pushed towards mid-on for a single but there is a direct hit at the non-striker's end and the ball runs away to the boundary!
full in length outside off stump, driven on the up to mid-off
short in length, on the middle and leg, short-arm pull to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
full in length, around the off stump, Akmal moves back and across to turn it to backward point
not all that short of length, Akmal shapes for his short-arm pull but wisely decides against it at the last minute and ends up stabbing it away to the on side
stands up tall to push the length delivery to cover
full again but well outside off stump and Akmal lashes it over point with his typical airy square drive that he plays so well .
130.4 kmph lifting delivery and the debutant hops to keep it down on the on side. Akmal says something and Shahzaib nods
Two slips watch as Shahzaib allows the length delivery to curve through to the 'keeper
Top-edges the pull to fine-leg boundary and these are his first runs in international cricket. It was the short-pitched delivery on the off stump and he went for the pull
attempted yorker and Shahzaib digs it out
length delivery moving in towards off and middle, pats it to the off side
in the channel outside off, left alone
full in length on the middle stump line, retains the strike with a little dab to midwicket
flighted outside off stump, Shahzaib went for the big shot, didn't time it well but it lands safely in deep extra cover region
Ah! another mishit as Shahzaib is beaten in flight but he had enough meat on it to just clear mid-on
Third time lucky and what a hit from the debutant. He stretched forward, reached the pitch of the flighted delivery and swing it high over long-off.
the quick arm ball, skidding towards middle and off, defended
leans forward to defendt
pushed well down the off side
flighted around the off stump, leans forward to defend
Superb shot from Akmal. It was full and straight, Akmal leaned into it and lifted it deliciously straight. And he holds his pose.
But he is gone now. Mills hurled a short-pitched delivery and Akmal swivelled to pull, hit it cleanly but straight to deep square leg
short in length and outside off stump, Razzaq stands up tall to play a nice-looking punchy stroke through covers
lifting delivery outside off, Shahzaib stands up tall, gets on top of the bounce and guides it down to third man
short delivery outside off stump, pushes inside the line
shaping away from the off stump and it curves past the outside edge. Ooh s and aahs from Mills
fullish, homing in on the off stump, jabbed off the outer edge to backward point
Shahzaib shows us another glimpse of his talent. It was a short-pitched delivery on the off stump, he rocked ball to unfurl a feisty pull shot. One bounce and over the ropes.
Even better. What a stunning upper cut. Lifting delivery outside offstump and he cut it up and over backward point. Very stylishly done.

He continues to lash away merrily. Yet another Pakistani player who shines on his debut. They have a great tradition and history of doing this. It was slightly short and Shahzaib drag-pulls it through midwicket.
full in length and moving in towards middle stump, defended on the front foot
lovely yorker just outside off stump, stabbed to the off side
outswinger around the off stump, pushed to cover point where a tumbling stop is made
length delivery just outside off stump, defended to point
in the zone outside off stump, Shahzaib flirts with it and is beaten. He is not happy with himself, practices defending it in the V
yorker length and dug out quietly to the off side
Wallop! What a bundle of talent. It was slightly short and Shahzaib swiveled off the front foot to pull it high over midwicket boundary. The crowd roar.
digs in the bouncer and Shahzaib ducks
full on the off and middle, defended to cover
slows up the pace, tosses it up more, driven to cover
turning away from Razzaq who square drives it to deep point
lunges forward to push it to the off side
the arm-ball on the off stump, cut away to deep point
nicely flighted delivery, slower through the air, Razzaq was sucked into a forward prod and edged the waft. Very good delivery.

Oh what have you done Shahzaib? He pushed it towards midwicket and set off for a suicidal single. He was obviously sent back as the ball had not gone too far away from Brendon McCullum who fired in a fast throw to McGlashan who removed the bails. Gone. A very fine debut comes to an end. He packed in quite a few entertaining and thrilling hits in his action-packed innings.
He starts off with a four. He leans forward to play a fine paddle sweep. Now, a leg slip moves in.
low dipping full toss, hit well to the right of Nathan McCullum who makes a stunning diving stop. What a athletic pair of brothers
turned through the on side for a single
floated full on the middle and leg, Shoaib sweeps it hard for his first boundary
full and straight, driven to long-off for a single

Another fine piece of bowling from Dan. Again, he slowed up the pace, looped it up ever so slowly outside off, Malik was early into his drive, tried to check it but ended up chipping it straight to cover
leans well forward to defend down the track
flighted outside off and Younis plays his favourite sweep to get off the mark
shuffles towards off stump, pushes it through midwicket for a single
quicker one, on the middle and off, punched back to the bowler
fullish, on the middle and leg, flicked to deep backward square-leg region
low dipping full toss, pushed back to the bowler
the bouncer on the middle stump and Afridi goes down under
lunges out to drive hard past the non-striker, who ducks, and down to long-on
full and straight, works to wide midwicket for a single
Slower one attempted but it will be picked up from the wide midwicket boundary. Afiridi waited for it before he pulled it to the boundary
flighted on the middle and off, driven to long-off
lovely slow delivery, Afridi is upto the task, though, he waits before working it through wide mid-on
drifts towards middle stump, defended on the front foot
lunges forward to tap it past square leg for a single
the arm-ball curving in to the middle, Afridi picks it, goes back to defend it to the on side
slower in the air, outside off stump, cut away to deep point
short and wide, Afridi reaches out, takes the bottom-hand off the handle so that he completes the arc and reaches the ball, cuts it wide of sweeper cover
from round the stumps, full and outside off, Afridi reaches out to drive wide of long-off for two more runs
Franklin tries a slower one and Afridi reads it early and dismisses it to extra-cover boundary. It was well outside off and he lashed it away
full and again, well outside off, Afridi reaches out to slice it high over backward point
shuffles towards off stump and guides the full delivery to point. Just four runs away from victory.
moves towards off stump and flicks it past square leg for couple of runs. Just 2 more.

What a win for Pakistan. They rediscovered their flair and the tournament has come alive. It was floated full and outside off stump and Afridi went for the big slog sweep, top edged it high over midwicket. McCullum ran back and the deep midwicket fielder ran in and they collided as the ball landed between them. Both seem to be ok, though.
